00195 // Reminder: cons.hpp expects nil to be defined somewhere (for this
00196 // implementation, Cell.cpp is the logical place to define it).
00197 // Here we promise this again, just to be safe.
00198 extern Cell* const nil;

00596 template<typename T>
00597 void safe_delete(T& c)
00598 {
00599   if (c != nil) delete c;
00600   c = nil;
00601 }
